publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-5231 Bruce Crawford: Schools (Consultation) (Scotland) Billâ€”That the Parliament agrees that, during Stage 3 of the Schools (Consultation) (Scotland) Bill, debate on the group of amendments shall, subject to Rule 9.8.4A, be brought to a conclusion by the time limit indicated, that time limit being calculated from when the Stage begins and excluding any periods when other business is under consideration or when a meeting of the Parliament is suspended (other than a suspension following the first division in the Stage being called) or otherwise not in progress: Group 1: 35 minutes. Supported by: Fiona Hyslop*
